title: Counterclockwise
summary: Think different and swim against the current - all with this watch face
description: Tease your brain by using this watch face. Be a hipster, a trend-setter. Left is the new right, just dare using Counterclockwise. It's as useful as it looks. Hmm, what else can I say?It's a unisex watch face, did I mention this? Sooooo, I-N-S-T-A-L-L this one and let your friends know (in case you have some, which might not be the case since you kept on reading till here...)For british people: it's anticlockwise.
descriptionHTML:
Tease your brain by using this watch face. Be a hipster, a trend-setter. Left is the new right, just dare using Counterclockwise. It's as useful as it looks. Hmm, what else can I say?
It's a unisex watch face, did I mention this? Sooooo, I-N-S-T-A-L-L this one and let your friends know (in case you have some, which might not be the case since you kept on reading till here...)
For british people: it's anticlockwise.
comments: Where is it ? Installed it but where is it ? No app, no widget, no option to open from install screen, nothing. Not very good... uninstalled as pointless. Note3.
Looks great. Does it support ticwatch?
It's nice app and I loved it instantly
